SYSTEM: 06_NonStandardOWLReasoning_ModularisationAndDebugging.pdf: Página 27
Justifications
• Justifications are a kind of explanation
• Justifications are minimal subsets of an ontology that are 
sufficient for a given entailment to hold
• Also known as MUPS (Minimal Unsatisfiability-Preserving 
Sub-TBox), MinAs
